SubscriptionTenantId.Description: Tenant Id for Azure active subscription where all resources will be created.

Location.Description: Azure region resources will be created in.

ResourceGroupName.Description: The resource group name that will contain all resources created.

BaseAppName.Description: The base app name that will be used to create bot app and config app.

BaseResourceName.Description: The base name to use for the resources that will be provisioned.

ConfigAdminUPNList.Description: Semicolon-delimited list of the user principal names (UPNs) allowed to access the configuration app.

AppDescription.Value: A friendly FAQ bot that answers questions and connects you to experts.

AppIconUrl.Description: The link to the icon for the app. It must resolve to a PNG file.

Sku.Description: The pricing tier for the hosting plan.

PlanSize.Description: The size of the hosting plan (small, medium, or large).

QuestionAnswerServiceSku.Description: The pricing tier for the QuestionAnswer service.

SearchServiceSku.Description: The pricing tier for the Azure Search service.

GitRepoUrl.Description: The URL to the GitHub repository to deploy.

GitBranch.Description: The branch of the GitHub repository to deploy.

IsMigration.Description: True if the app template is being migrated from older version (< 4.0.0). False by default.

QuestionAnswerProjectName.description: The Question Answering service project name.

QuestionAnswerDeploymentName.description: The Question Answering service deployment name.
